column2: Open the Silk Road is a masterful investment.
A careful ruler, in certain times, may be forced to close the trade with the West.

The Silk Road is open. Any trade junction located on the Silk Road will get a constant gain from its opening. Main junctions: 
§Y*§! Chang'an
§Y*§! Chenzhou
§Y*§! Luoyang
§Y*§! Huzhou
§Y*§! Nanyang
§Y*§! Kaiping
§Y*§! Dingxi
§Y*§! Lanzhou
§Y*§! Turpan
§Y*§! Kashgar
§Y*§! Khotan
§Y*§! Samarkand
§Y*§! Rayy
§Y*§! Baghdad
§Y*§! Antioch
§Y*§! Tyrus
§Y*§! Alexandria
§Y*§! Constantinple
§Y*§! Venice
§Y*§! Rome
We have open the Silk Road.
Now we can receive a constant gain across the vast distances that separate us from rich countries like Fulin, Yancai, Ta-Yuan, Da Xia, Tianzhu, and many others...
This is the will of heaven.
The Silk Road is closed. Any trade junction cease to obtain profit
We have closed the Silk Road.
The prestige of Chung-hua will be less, and also our income. But also the gain of the barbarians will be significantly reduced.
This is the will of heaven.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Chang'an.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Chenzhou.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Luoyang.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Huzhou. Now they can embark and reach the distant India.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Nanyang.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Kaiping.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in the city of Bao.
Traders from distant places bring with them leather, silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Lanzhou.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in great city-oasis of Turpan.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in great city-oasis of Kashgar.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in great city-oasis of Khotan.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in ancient persian city of Samarkand.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in ancient persian city of Rayy.
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Baghdad, the "City of Peace".

Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in the ancient city of Antioch. Now they can embark and reach the shores of Europe, or continue their jorney to Constantinople.

Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in the city of Tyrus, now called "Sur" in arabian. Now they can embark and reach the shores of Europe

Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in the city of Constantine, the Queen of the Cities. Now they can embark and reach the shores of western Europe
Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in Venice, after a long sea journey.

Traders from distant places bring with them silk, spices, gold, silver and other precious materials have made their entrance in the port of Ostia, the "sea gate" of the Eternal City, after a long sea journey.

The rulers of the lands of the cathay have decided to reopen the Silk Road, the ancient route that transported large amounts of wealth through miles and miles, from end to end of the world. Any trade junction located on the Silk Road will get a constant gain from its opening.
